S.FORM: Malu namu kana ho? Prading ta di.
Malo namo kana ho? Prading ta di.
Heyu! Thmuku!
Heyo! Thmoko!
Mptgesa malu.
Mptgesa malo.
sndamac su.
sndamac so.
Tloong.
Tloong.
sndamc namu,tgsaun maku kari Seediq so ppukun.
sndamc namo,tgsaon mako kari Seediq so ppokon.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的賽德克語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Sederik.

S.FORM: Klaun su mbahang kari mtgesa?
Klaon so mbahang kari mtgesa?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: Ini mu klai mptgesa, rengo texan dungan ho?
Ini mo klai mptgesa, rengo texan dongan ho?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: Ini ku qbahang, kparu hari rmengo ho?
Ini ko qbahang, kparo hari rmengo ho?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: Qita hini, snegun kenan smepu rmengo.
Qita hini, snegon kenan smepo rmengo.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: Malu bale smnepu muuyas namu.
Malo bale smnepo mooyas namo.
Sepu muuyas texan, kparu heri hrenang.
Sepo mooyas texan, kparo heri hrenang.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: Kmelux, iya squwaq
Kmelox, iya sqowaq
Ngali baro patis namu.
Ngali baro patis namo.
Un, mptgesa.
Un, mptgesa.
Angal baro ppatis namu.
Angal baro ppatis namo.
Mptgesa, cmhungi ku madis ppatis da.
Mptgesa, cmhongi ko madis ppatis da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Angal baro ka sserus namu.
Angal baro ka sseros namo.
Mptgesa, cmhungi ku madis sserus da.
Mptgesa, cmhongi ko madis sseros da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: Usa kmbarux ssiyo su.
Usa kmbarox ssiyo so.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: Kbrexi ku sserus ho?
Kbrexi ko sseros ho?
Msange ta muuyas di.
Msange ta mooyas di.
Betaq hini snlhayan ta han, psterung ta bobo gdregan.
Betaq hini snlhayan ta han, psterong ta bobo gdregan.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: Ima su?
Ima so?
Umin ku.
Umin ko.
Ima su?
Ima so?
Laqi ku na Taso, Umin ku.
Laqi ko na Taso, Umin ko.
S.TRANSL: I am Taso’s son, and my name is Umin.

S.FORM: Ima su?
Ima so?
Tnugsaan ku na Watan, Siyac ku.
Tnogsaan ko na Watan, Siyac ko.
S.TRANSL: I am a student of Watan, my name is Siyac.

S.FORM: Ima ngayan su?
Ima ngayan so?
Ngayan mu o Siyac.
Ngayan mo o Siyac.
ima ngayan Tama su.
ima ngayan Tama so.
Ngayan tama mu we Walis.
Ngayan tama mo we Walis.
Ima ka heya?
Ima ka heya?
Temu ka heya.
Temo ka heya.
Heya ge qbsuran mu, ngayan na Temu.
Heya ge qbsoran mo, ngayan na Temo.
S.TRANSL: He’s my brother, his name is Temu.

S.FORM: Maanu ka ngayan na?
Maano ka ngayan na?
Temu ngayan na.
Temo ngayan na.
Ye temu ngayan na?
Ye temo ngayan na?
Un, ngayan na we Temu.
Un, ngayan na we Temo.
Ye Temu ngayan na?
Ye Temo ngayan na?
uxe, Kuras ka ngayan na.
oxe, Koras ka ngayan na.
Ima ka seediq gaga?
Ima ka seediq gaga?
Kumu ka heya, swayi bubu mu.
Komo ka heya, swayi bobo mo.
Ima ka seediq gaga?
Ima ka seediq gaga?
Dangi mu ngayan na ge Seta.
Dangi mo ngayan na ge Seta.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Seta。
She’s a friend of mine, and her name is Seta.

S.FORM: Piya kngkawas su di?
Piya kngkawas so di?
10 kngkawas mu.
10 kngkawas mo.
Piya kngkawas na di?
Piya kngkawas na di?
12 kngkawas na.
12 kngkawas na.
Piya kngkawas na tama su?
Piya kngkawas na tama so?
50 kngkawas na tama mu.
50 kngkawas na tama mo.
Piya kana mntswai namu?
Piya kana mntswai namo?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: 2 ka qbsuran mu rseno ma mqedil, 1 ge swai mqedil.
2 ka qbsoran mo rseno ma mqedil, 1 ge swai mqedil.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: Ye su niqan qbsuran rseno?
Ye so niqan qbsoran rseno?
Uka ku qbsruran rseno.
Uka ko qbsroran rseno.
Piya namu heyi kana sapah namu?
Piya namo heyi kana sapah namo?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: 4 nami heyi ga sapah.
4 nami heyi ga sapah.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: Ga su matis inu?
Ga so matis ino?
Ga ku muuyas Karenko.
Ga ko mooyas Karenko.
Ima ka heya?
Ima ka heya?
Swai na tama mu ka heya.
Swai na tama mo ka heya.
Ga meepah maanu ka swai bubu su?
Ga meepah maano ka swai bobo so?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: Knsacu ka heya.
Knsaco ka heya.
Ima ka sediq gaga?
Ima ka sediq gaga?
Qbsuran mu mqedil ka heya.
Qbsoran mo mqedil ka heya.
Niqan qpahur na qbsuran mqedil su?
Niqan qpahor na qbsoran mqedil so?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: Gaga meepah biyoing ka heya.
Gaga meepah biyoing ka heya.
Mtswai ka dheya daha?
Mtswai ka dheya daha?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: Uxe, msdangi ka dheya.
Uxe, msdangi ka dheya.
Seediq su tmpusu?
Seediq so tmposo?
Un, Seediq ku bale.
Un, Seediq ko bale.
Ye seediq tmpusu ka qedil su?
Ye seediq tmposo ka qedil so?
Un, pawan cu ka heya.
Un, pawan co ka heya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, but she’s from the Paiwan tribe.

S.FORM: Ye reko ka tama su?
Ye reko ka tama so?
Kiya, reko nami kana tnsapah.
Kiya, reko nami kana tnsapah.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: Ye wada muuyas ptasan ka swai su mqedil?
Ye wada mooyas ptasan ka swai so mqedil?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: Un, wada musa muuyas sapah pyasan di.
Un, wada mosa mooyas sapah pyasan di.
Ye mkela rmengo kari seediq ka swai su?
Ye mkela rmengo kari seediq ka swai so?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: Un, mkela rmengo kari seediq ka dheya.
Un, mkela rmengo kari seediq ka dheya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: Piya mntswai namu?
Piya mntswai namo?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: 3 nami mntswai mqedil ma rseno.
3 nami mntswai mqedil ma rseno.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: Ye su gaga msuupu tama bubu meniq sapah.
Ye so gaga msoopo tama bobo meniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: Un, msuupu ku tama bubu mu meniq sapah.
Un, msoopo ko tama bobo mo meniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: Ye su gaga msuupu meniq tama rudan ma bubu rudan?
Ye so gaga msoopo meniq tama rodan ma bobo rodan?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: Ini, ini ku psuupu dheya meniq sapah.
Ini, ini ko psoopo dheya meniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn’t live with them.

S.FORM: Ima ga su spuun meniq sapah.
Ima ga so spoon meniq sapah.
Msuupu ku tama bubu ma qbsurn mu meniq sapah.
Msoopo ko tama bobo ma qbsorn mo meniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: Pneyah su inu?
Pneyah so ino?
Pneyah ku Karenko.
Pneyah ko Karenko.
Ga inu ka sapah namu?
Ga ino ka sapah namo?
Gaga Karenko ka sapah nami.
Gaga Karenko ka sapah nami.
Inu ka alang su?
Ino ka alang so?
Gaga Paran ka alang mu.
Gaga Paran ka alang mo.
Gaga inu ka alang namu?
Gaga ino ka alang namo?
Gaga paran ka alang nami.
Gaga paran ka alang nami.
Maha su knuwan ka alang su?
Maha so knowan ka alang so?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Maha ku sngayan rbagan klali.
Maha ko sngayan rbagan klali.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: laqi ku Seediq.
laqi ko Seediq.
Hmuwa karac saya?
Hmowa karac saya?
Pkriyak ka hido de, mtilux ka karat.
Pkriyak ka hido de, mtilox ka karat.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: Ye ga msekuy ka nganauc?
Ye ga msekoy ka nganaoc?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: Msekuy ba, plukus egu hari.
Msekoy ba, plokos ego hari.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Mtilux ka nganguc ho?
Mtilox ka ngangoc ho?
Ini, niqan bgihur di, mtletu ba.
Ini, niqan bgihor di, mtleto ba.
Hmuwa ka karat saya?
Hmowa ka karat saya?
Ini ksekuy ma ini ktilux saya, malu ba.
Ini ksekoy ma ini ktilox saya, malo ba.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: Hmuwa karat ali keeman ho?
Hmowa karat ali keeman ho?
Uka plabu ka karat, pkriyak kana pngerah di.
Uka plabo ka karat, pkriyak kana pngerah di.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: Hmuwa karat gaga ngangut?
Hmowa karat gaga ngangot?
Hani musuwan, pkriyak ka hido, pkriyak ka hako utux di.
Hani mosowan, pkriyak ka hido, pkriyak ka hako otox di.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: Hmuwa karat gaga su niqun hiya?
Hmowa karat gaga so niqon hiya?
S.TRANSL: What's the weather like where you are?

S.FORM: Paru bgihur ga nami hini.
Paro bgihor ga nami hini.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Malu ka karat namu hiya?
Malo ka karat namo hiya?
Malu ba, paru ba hido.
Malo ba, paro ba hido.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: Maha ku sapah pyasan da.
Maha ko sapah pyasan da.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: Msekuy ka karat, keegu hari mlukus.
Msekoy ka karat, keego hari mlokos.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Maha ku nganguc di.
Maha ko ngangoc di.
Mquyux kiyahari, iya chungi madis trasi.
Mqoyox kiyahari, iya chongi madis trasi.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Ye mpquyux?
Ye mpqoyox?
Mnbruwa soni, yaani mpquyux kiya hari.
Mnbrowa soni, yaani mpqoyox kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: Mnbruwa soni, yaani mpquyux kiya hari.
Mnbrowa soni, yaani mpqoyox kiya hari.
Qmnuyux soni, nii msuwan di.
Qmnoyox soni, nii msowan di.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux di?
Gaga qmoyox di?
So hari qmnuyux, mhuriq ka elu.
So hari qmnoyox, mhoriq ka elo.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: Ye qmnuyux? Ma mhuriq kana heyi su?
Ye qmnoyox? Ma mhoriq kana heyi so?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka nganguc, ini ku adis trasi.
Gaga qmoyox ka ngangoc, ini ko adis trasi.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Ye su ga malu?
Ye so ga malo?
Paru ba bgihur, mnarux ka tunux mu nyupan na.
Paro ba bgihor, mnarox ka tonox mo nyopan na.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: Ye su ga malu?
Ye so ga malo?
Paru ba hido, mtgiya tunux mu pnhdagan na.
Paro ba hido, mtgiya tonox mo pnhdagan na.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: Cmhungi ku madis ppatis di.
Cmhongi ko madis ppatis di.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Kbrexun sumu.
Kbrexon somo.
Cmhungi ku madis atak di.
Cmhongi ko madis atak di.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: Ini ku adis uri, saye ta mari ho.
Ini ko adis ori, saye ta mari ho.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: Seye ta mari ppais hu?
Seye ta mari ppais ho?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: Un, umbari ka sserus uri.
Un, ombari ka sseros ori.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: Seye ta mari uqun mgrebu ho?
Seye ta mari oqon mgrebo ho?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: Uxe ku, mnekan ku sapah di.
Uxe ko, mnekan ko sapah di.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: Cmhungi ku pstilux hndayu di.
Cmhongi ko pstilox hndayo di.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Sayi pstilux nahari!
Sayi pstilox nahari!
Cmhungi ku madis hndayu di.
Cmhongi ko madis hndayo di.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Suupu ta mekan handayu mu
Soopo ta mekan handayo mo
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: Mkmekan su maanu ka cekanaali?
Mkmekan so maano ka cekanaali?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Meekan ku hnpure piyasn/gako.
Meekan ko hnpore piyasn/gako.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: Meekan su maanu ka ceka hido.
Meekan so maano ka ceka hido.
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnadis ku handayu ali saya, suupu ta mekan ceka naali ho?
Mnadis ko handayo ali saya, soopo ta mekan ceka naali ho?
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: Saye ta theyaq boru rancyo ho?
Saye ta theyaq boro rancyo ho?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: Un! Nita.
Un! Nita.
Saye ta theyaq pangcyo ho?
Saye ta theyaq pangcyo ho?
Uxe ku, mqita ka patis.
Uxe ko, mqita ka patis.
Dyagi ku mangan skesik.
Dyagi ko mangan skesik.
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: Un, angan ka skesik nii.
Un, angan ka skesik nii.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: Dyagi ku mangan galiq sserus hu?
Dyagi ko mangan galiq sseros ho?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: Nii ku smkesik, plwani Walis mege isu.
Nii ko smkesik, plwani Walis mege iso.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor and you asked Walis to help you with it.

S.FORM: Mehedu su smkesik di?
Mehedo so smkesik di?
Mehedu ku smkesik di.
Mehedo ko smkesik di.
Ma su ini skesik?
Ma so ini skesik?
Mehedu ku smkesik di.
Mehedo ko smkesik di.
Rudiq ka dheran, sayi smerus tikoh.
Rodiq ka dheran, sayi smeros tikoh.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Un, saye ku mangan galiq sserus.
Un, saye ko mangan galiq sseros.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: rutiq ka mado gaga, sayi smerus tikoh.
rotiq ka mado gaga, sayi smeros tikoh.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Iya han, ini mu sseki ka hini na.
Iya han, ini mo sseki ka hini na.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: Mhuwa su kiya hari?
Mhowa so kiya hari?
Maha ku migin mptgesa.
Maha ko migin mptgesa.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: Mphuwa su malix muuyas?
Mphowa so malix mooyas?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: Mpsnegun ku dangi mu maha muuyas uyas.
Mpsnegon ko dangi mo maha mooyas oyas.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: Mphuwa ka heya malix muuyas?
Mphowa ka heya malix mooyas?
Maha lmanguy ka heya.
Maha lmangoy ka heya.
gaga sapah ka Kumu?
gaga sapah ka Komo?
Gaga sapah ka heya, teme.
Gaga sapah ka heya, teme.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: gaga sapah ka Kumu?
gaga sapah ka Komo?
Uka hini heya, maanu gimun su ho?
Uka hini heya, maano gimon so ho?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: Ima?
Ima?
Tama rudan, yaku Samu, rwahi ku.
Tama rodan, yako Samo, rwahi ko.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m Samu, please open the door.

S.FORM: Ima su?
Ima so?
Yaku tumun, meyah ku theyaq isu.
Yako tomon, meyah ko theyaq iso.
S.TRANSL: I’m tumun, I’ve come to play with you.

S.FORM: Sndamac su. bsiyaq ta ini tqita di.
Sndamac so. bsiyaq ta ini tqita di.
Kiya na, lnglungun sumu bale, nahari prengo ta!
Kiya na, lnglongon somo bale, nahari prengo ta!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: Tloong, mahi ocya.
Tloong, mahi ocya.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: Tloong, mahi waso qhuni.
Tloong, mahi waso qhoni.
Mhuwe su.
Mhowe so.
Mahi ocya.
Mahi ocya.
Mahi waso qhuni.
Mahi waso qhoni.
Ah! Malu ba mahan ka ocya namu.
Ah! Malo ba mahan ka ocya namo.
Ah! Malu ba mahan waso qhuni namu.
Ah! Malo ba mahan waso qhoni namo.
Uqe ta sweko nii!
Uqe ta sweko nii!
Malu ma, so ba malu uqun qtaan ka sweko nii.
Malo ma, so ba malo oqon qtaan ka sweko nii.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: Malu uqun sweko nii?
Malo oqon sweko nii?
Kiya, malu ba uqun.
Kiya, malo ba oqon.
Mahada hnpure na bubu di, eyah nahari mekan.
Mahada hnpore na bobo di, eyah nahari mekan.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: Un, saye ku trima baga han.
Un, saye ko trima baga han.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: Kntengi mekan, uxe su seediq nganguc.
Kntengi mekan, oxe so seediq ngangoc.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: Egu pnuqan mu da, mtengi ku bale.
Ego pnoqan mo da, mtengi ko bale.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I’m full.

S.FORM: Puqi egu hari, iya qsiqa.
Poqi ego hari, iya qsiqa.
Un, malu uqun.
Un, malo oqon.
Maha ku han, yahun su qmita bobo na di.

Uxe ta beyo dehok da?

Tnoapa ko baso meyah.

huwa mesa musa sapah pyasan klaali?
howa mesa mosa sapah pyasan klaali?

knheno bsiyaq taapa baso mosa sapah pyasan?

1 patis hido pdehok Taycong.

Mkela su taapa jidensya?
Mkela so taapa jidensya?

S.FORM: Malu, traun sumu sapah mu.
Malo, traon somo sapah mo.

S.FORM: Maha ku dgiyaq, ini ku eniq sapah.
Maha ko dgiyaq, ini ko eniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I’m going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won’t be home.

S.FORM: Klaun su ba gaga Seediq mesa bnhangan mu, mkmeyah ku ptgesa isu.
Klaon so ba gaga Seediq mesa bnhangan mo, mkmeyah ko ptgesa iso.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對賽德克族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I’ve heard that you’re very knowledgeable about the traditional customs of the Sedykes and would like to ask you a few questions.

S.FORM: Ini keegu gnklaan mu, kiya ge tlame mu cmiyuk rmengo.
Ini keego gnklaan mo, kiya ge tlame mo cmiyok rmengo.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don’t know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: Ye ku malu psasing? Kiya maha leexan spatis.
Ye ko malo psasing? Kiya maha leexan spatis.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。

S.FORM: Malu, ini huwa.
Malo, ini howa.
Piya kngkawas su kawas saya di?
Piya kngkawas so kawas saya di?

Deho ko 98 kngkawas di.

Ma so wakayi na.

Ma so riso na.

Ma so weewa na.

Uxe wa! Roda ko di.

Pneyah so ino ho?

Pneyah ko Tongan.

Is your wife also a Sedek?

Mqaras ko dehok ko meyah smiling sonan, rengo tikoh, so gaya mosa tmlenga ho?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It’s a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: Un, slaqi ku ciida we musa ku paha tlenga camac.
Un, slaqi ko ciida we mosa ko paha tlenga camac.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: Mhuwe su, malu ba tnugesa su ali saya.
Mhowe so, malo ba tnogesa so ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: Bable ba kana rnengo mu, snneru na rudan cbeyo.
Bable ba kana rnengo mo, snnero na rodan cbeyo.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: Betaq hini han sniling mu, mhuwe su bale bnege su.
Betaq hini han sniling mo, mhowe so bale bnege so.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。

S.FORM: Iya qsiqa, prengo ta bobo na di.
Iya qsiqa, prengo ta bobo na di.

Kmbaroy ko kingal bosi.

S.FORM: Niqan, piya kmbrigun su?
Niqan, piya kmbrigon so?

Umbaroy ko beras.

Umbari ko 2 abora.

Msngari nami kingal bale.

Umbari ko 2 pixil.

Msngari ba 3 bnkeyan, angan kana da.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: Piya pila ka beras nii.
Piya pila ka beras nii.

Uxe wa, mhenok ka nii di.

Umbari ko pinkan nii.

mterol ka pinkan nii. Mano kmngalon so nana ho?

$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

ye malo kbraxo ko pila so ho?

S.FORM: Cmhungi ku madis pila da, kbrexo ta tikoh pila su ho?
Cmhongi ko madis pila da, kbrexo ta tikoh pila so ho?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
