Qmoyox di, ini ko adis trasi, kbrxi ko trasi so ho?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: Niqan ku kingal ba trasi, suupu ta tbubung da.
Niqan ko kingal ba trasi, soopo ta tbobong da.
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: Nii ka kmbrexan mu patis su, nii mu hadun da.
Nii ka kmbrexan mo patis so, nii mo hadon da.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: Kmqmita su patis maanu patis, rngagi ku.
Kmqmita so patis maano patis, rngagi ko.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: Knuwan ka yahun mu pririh mege knberxan mu?
Knowan ka yahon mo pririh mege knberxan mo?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: Ini huwa, niqan pila su de rengo ta ciida.
Ini howa, niqan pila so de rengo ta ciida.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: Knuwan ka yahun su pririh mega kmrexan su kena?
Knowan ka yahon so pririh mega kmrexan so kena?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: Yahun mu mege kusun ka kmbrxan mu.
Yahon mo mege koson ka kmbrxan mo.
S.TRANSL: I will return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: Knuwan ka yahun su mege kmbrezan su patis?
Knowan ka yahon so mege kmbrezan so patis?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: Uxe su mu wada sbege ciga ka kmbrexan di?
Uxe so mo wada sbege ciga ka kmbrexan di?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: Knbrexan su na Watan ka ppatis nii?
Knbrexan so na Watan ka ppatis nii?
S.TRANSL: Did Watan lend you this pen?

S.FORM: Kiya wa, knbarux mu ali saya.
Kiya wa, knbarox mo ali saya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: Knbarux su Watan ka ppatis nii?
Knbarox so Watan ka ppatis nii?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Watan?

S.FORM: Uxe, bnaruy bubu mu.
Uxe, bnaroy bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: Uka timu da, usa kmbarux tikuh Tumun.
Uka timo da, osa kmbarox tikoh Tomon.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Tumun.

S.FORM: Un, saye ku kmbarux.
Un, saye ko kmbarox.
Hadi kenan kmbrexn su kesa Tumun.
Hadi kenan kmbrexn so kesa Tomon.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Tumun to give me back my money.

S.FORM: Piya pila knbrex na sunan ka heya?
Piya pila knbrex na sonan ka heya?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: Maha su inu ho?
Maha so ino ho?
Maha ku mhuma sama pphmaan sama.
Maha ko mhoma sama pphmaan sama.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Gaga su hmuwa?
Gaga so hmowa?
Egu ba sudu, nii ku tmatak, umpcuwaq ku qsiya kiya hari.
Ego ba sodo, nii ko tmatak, ompcowaq ko qsiya kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: Diyagi ku madis qburung ma labah ho?
Diyagi ko madis qborong ma labah ho?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: Ga su psaun ini ho?
Ga so psaon ini ho?
Gaga psaan siyo bkahan hiya.
Gaga psaan siyo bkahan hiya.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: Tnnabun su di?
Tnnabon so di?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Hani mu tnabun, umphuma ku kiya hari.
Hani mo tnabon, omphoma ko kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: Ye su syukaku pnhmaan su damac di?
Ye so syokako pnhmaan so damac di?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: Syukaku ku kawricay nii da, cahocay gaga we ini na.
Syokako ko kawricay nii da, cahocay gaga we ini na.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: Wa! Ma egu knriyan su bunga nii.
Wa! Ma ego knriyan so bonga nii.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
=Wow! You dug up so many squash.

S.FORM: Dyagi ku posa repun ho?
Dyagi ko posa repon ho?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: Gaga namu hmuwa?
Gaga namo hmowa?
Nii namu paha kadi qcurux.
Nii namo paha kadi qcorox.
S.TRANSL: We're releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: Egu qcurux ka hini?
Ego qcorox ka hini?
Egu qcurux qnerat nami gaga kobu.
Ego qcorox qnerat nami gaga kobo.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: Huwa su mesa qmrerat qcurux?
Howa so mesa qmrerat qcorox?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: dmoyi ku btakan betaq qcurux.
dmoyi ko btakan betaq qcorox.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: Dmoi su budi cmebu camac?
Dmoi so bodi cmebo camac?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: Smalu ku tlenga qmerac camac, duma we madis ku halung ma huling.
Smalo ko tlenga qmerac camac, doma we madis ko halong ma holing.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: Toqin boyak ka elu nii.
Toqin boyak ka elo nii.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: Ma su mkela?
Ma so mkela?
Nii ge dapil boyak, kiya si ndaa elu boyak.
Nii ge dapil boyak, kiya si ndaa elo boyak.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: Saye ta nahari qmita tlena ta, so hari gaga tdiyan di.
Saye ta nahari qmita tlena ta, so hari gaga tdiyan di.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: Ma su mkela?
Ma so mkela?
So hari wada smkenux ka huling, saye ta smnegun nahari.
So hari wada smkenox ka holing, saye ta smnegon nahari.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let's follow them.

S.FORM: Gaga namu smmalu maanu?
Gaga namo smmalo maano?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: Nii ge qapi btunux, qmapi qolic.
Nii ge qapi btonox, qmapi qolic.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: Maanu ga su psaan hiya?
Maano ga so psaan hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: Nii we tlenga durang papak, dmurang pada.
Nii we tlenga dorang papak, dmorang pada.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: Mqars Utux tmninun, egu ba nngalan miya camac.
Mqars Utox tmninon, ego ba nngalan miya camac.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: Kiya na! deso ta alng ma beleqo ta msaau mege!
Kiya na! deso ta alng ma beleqo ta msaao mege!
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let's take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: Mptgesa ku mhuwa mesa mrengo camac ka Seediq ali saya.
Mptgesa ko mhowa mesa mrengo camac ka Seediq ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的賽德克語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in 3S3T language today.

S.FORM: Mptgesa ku mhuwa mesa mrengo hmneru naq ka Seediq ali saya.
Mptgesa ko mhowa mesa mrengo hmnero naq ka Seediq ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的賽德克語怎麼說。

S.FORM: Mptgesa ku mhuwa mesa mrengo hei qhuni ka Seediq ali saya.
Mptgesa ko mhowa mesa mrengo hei qhoni ka Seediq ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的賽德克語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in 3S3T language today.

S.FORM: Iya qtaqi.
Iya qtaqi.
Iya squwaq.
Iya sqowaq.
Iya ekan ppuqun.
Iya ekan ppoqon.
Ngali ka patis su.
Ngali ka patis so.
Ngali ka ppatis su.
Ngali ka ppatis so.
Ngali ka spatis su.
Ngali ka spatis so.
Skui ka patis su.
Skoi ka patis so.
Skui ka ppatis su.
Skoi ka ppatis so.
Skui ka ppuqun su.
Skoi ka ppoqon so.
Skui ka rngayan su.
Skoi ka rngayan so.
Nima ka ppatis nii?
Nima ka ppatis nii?
Naku.
Nako.
Nima ka patis nii?
Nima ka patis nii?
Na Kuras.
Na Koras.
Nima ka serus nii?
Nima ka seros nii?
Ima mkela!
Ima mkela!
Na Kuras ka lukus waga?
Na Koras ka lokos waga?
Uxe, lukus pbabo na Ape ka nii.
Uxe, lokos pbabo na Ape ka nii.
Mptgesa, ini ku adis patis.
Mptgesa, ini ko adis patis.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: Suupu qmita yamu ka kmxalan su ssiyo.
Soopo qmita yamo ka kmxalan so ssiyo.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: Wada gerung ka ppatis mu di.
Wada gerong ka ppatis mo di.
Ngali yencupi matis.
Ngali yencopi matis.
Kbarux na kmxalan su.
Kbarox na kmxalan so.
Wada mgedang ka serus mu da.
Wada mgedang ka seros mo da.
Ngali serus mu nii hayan.
Ngali seros mo nii hayan.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: Maalix ta muuyas da. Tai hari eluw musa su sapah!
Maalix ta mooyas da. Tai hari elow mosa so sapah!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: Un! Mhuwe su wa! Mptgesa.
Un! Mhowe so wa! Mptgesa.
Malix ta muuyas da! Swae ta.
Malix ta mooyas da! Swae ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Swae ta da! Mptgesa.
Swae ta da! Mptgesa.
Sndamac namu bale. Awi ngayan mu ka yaku.
Sndamac namo bale. Awi ngayan mo ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Awi.

S.FORM: Sndamac su bale! Awi.
Sndamac so bale! Awi.
Sndamac namu bale. Tude ngayan mu ka yaku.
Sndamac namo bale. Tode ngayan mo ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Tude.

S.FORM: Sndamac su bale wa! Tude.
Sndamac so bale wa! Tode.
Sndamac su bale. Awi ku ka yaku.
Sndamac so bale. Awi ko ka yako.
Sndamac su bale Awi! Yaku ge, Iban.
Sndamac so bale Awi! Yako ge, Iban.
Sndamac su bale! Yaku ge, Tude.
Sndamac so bale! Yako ge, Tode.
Tude, Sndamac su bale! Yaku ge, Iban.
Tode, Sndamac so bale! Yako ge, Iban.
Ima su ka isu?
Ima so ka iso?
Lubi ku ka yaku. Bubu ku na Pawan.
Lobi ko ka yako. Bobo ko na Pawan.
Ima su ka isu?
Ima so ka iso?
Swai ku mqedil na Pawan. Awe ka ngayan mu.
Swai ko mqedil na Pawan. Awe ka ngayan mo.
S.TRANSL: I am Pawan’s sister. My name is Awe.

S.FORM: Ima ka heya?
Ima ka heya?
Mptgesa mu ka heya. Utun ka ngayan na.
Mptgesa mo ka heya. Uton ka ngayan na.
Ima ka seediq waga?
Ima ka seediq waga?
Qbsuran mu rseno ka heya. Puhuk ka ngayan na.
Qbsoran mo rseno ka heya. Pohok ka ngayan na.
Ye Awi ka heya?
Ye Awi ka heya?
Un, Awi ka heya.
Un, Awi ka heya.
Awi su ka isu?
Awi so ka iso?
Uxe, Iban ku ka yaku.
Uxe, Iban ko ka yako.
Ima ka Awi?
Ima ka Awi?
Yaku ka Awi.
Yako ka Awi.
Ima ka Iban?
Ima ka Iban?
Dangi mu ka Iban.
Dangi mo ka Iban.
Ima ngayan na ka qbsuran su mqedil?
Ima ngayan na ka qbsoran so mqedil?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Ape ngayan na ka qbsuran mu mqedil.
Ape ngayan na ka qbsoran mo mqedil.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Ape.

S.FORM: Ima ngayan na ka swai su mqedil?
Ima ngayan na ka swai so mqedil?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Padiq ngayan na ka swai mu mqedil.
Padiq ngayan na ka swai mo mqedil.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Padiq.

S.FORM: Klaan su ima ka ngayan na?
Klaan so ima ka ngayan na?
Awi ngayan na ka heya.
Awi ngayan na ka heya.
Piya knkawas na qbsuran su rseno ka saya?
Piya knkawas na qbsoran so rseno ka saya?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: Maxal rima knkawas na heya ka saya di.
Maxal rima knkawas na heya ka saya di.
Piya knkawas na swai su rseno ka saya di?
Piya knkawas na swai so rseno ka saya di?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: Rima knkawas na heya ka saya di.
Rima knkawas na heya ka saya di.
Niqal sapah pyasan ka alang namu?
Niqal sapah pyasan ka alang namo?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: Niqal.
Niqal.
Ga su muuyas pyasan alang ka isu?
Ga so mooyas pyasan alang ka iso?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: Un, mntena miyan tnsapah muuyas pyasan ka hiya.
Un, mntena miyan tnsapah mooyas pyasan ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: Ima ka rseno waga?
Ima ka rseno waga?
Baki mu ka heya.
Baki mo ka heya.
Ima ka mqedil waga?
Ima ka mqedil waga?
Qbsuran mu mqedil ka heya.
Qbsoran mo mqedil ka heya.
Ima ka laqi waga?
Ima ka laqi waga?
Swai mu rseno ka heya.
Swai mo rseno ka heya.
Ga qmeepah maanu ka bubu su?
Ga qmeepah maano ka bobo so?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Supi ka heya.
Sopi ka heya.
Ga qmeepah maanu ka tama su?
Ga qmeepah maano ka tama so?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Mptgesa ka heya.
Mptgesa ka heya.
Swai su rseno ka heya?
Swai so rseno ka heya?
Uxe, dangi na swai mu rseno ka heya.
Uxe, dangi na swai mo rseno ka heya.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: Qbsuran su mqedil ka heya?
Qbsoran so mqedil ka heya?
Uxe, swai mu mqedil ka heya.
Uxe, swai mo mqedil ka heya.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: Piya kana hei tnsapah daha ka dheya?
Piya kana hei tnsapah daha ka dheya?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: Rima kana hei tnsapah daha ka dheya.
Rima kana hei tnsapah daha ka dheya.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: Piya kana laqi tnsapah namu ka yamu?
Piya kana laqi tnsapah namo ka yamo?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: Sepac kana laqi tnsapah miyan ka yami.
Sepac kana laqi tnsapah miyan ka yami.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: Piya kana mtswai su ka isu?
Piya kana mtswai so ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Teru ka swai mu mqedil, ma uka ku swai rseno ka yaku.
Tero ka swai mo mqedil, ma oka ko swai rseno ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: Piya kana ka qbsuran su?
Piya kana ka qbsoran so?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Uka ku qbsuran ka yaku.
Uka ko qbsoran ka yako.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: Piya kana ka mtswai su isu?
Piya kana ka mtswai so iso?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Laqi ku mtburux ku yaku.
Laqi ko mtborox ko yako.
Ye namu mtswai ka yamu?
Ye namo mtswai ka yamo?
Un, qbsuran mu rseno ka heya.
Un, qbsoran mo rseno ka heya.
Ye namu Seediq ka yamu?
Ye namo Seediq ka yamo?
Un, Seediq miyan ka yami.
Un, Seediq miyan ka yami.
Ye Seediq ka heya duri?
Ye Seediq ka heya dori?
Un, Seediq ka heya duri.
Un, Seediq ka heya dori.
S.TRANSL: 是的，她也是賽德克族人。

S.FORM: Malu karac ka ali saya?
Malo karac ka ali saya?
Msekuy hari wa! Mahi eguw hari ka dnngedang.
Msekoy hari wa! Mahi egow hari ka dnngedang.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: Malu karac ka ali saya?
Malo karac ka ali saya?
Mttilux hari wa! Mahi eguw hari ka qsiya.
Mttilox hari wa! Mahi egow hari ka qsiya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Hmuwa ka karac nganguc?
Hmowa ka karac ngangoc?
Ni thido paru! Tai hari ka tndhagan hei wa!
Ni thido paro! Tai hari ka tndhagan hei wa!
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: Hmuwa ka karac nganguc?
Hmowa ka karac ngangoc?
Ni msurung.
Ni msorong.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: Hmuwa ka karac kusun?
Hmowa ka karac koson?
Msurung, ma paru ka bgihur.
Msorong, ma paro ka bgihor.
S.TRANSL: It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: hmuwa ka karac ciida?
hmowa ka karac ciida?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: Mptleetu hari wa! Desi kingal lukus pbabo musa su.
Mptleeto hari wa! Desi kingal lokos pbabo mosa so.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: Hmuwa ka karac ali gdregan?
Hmowa ka karac ali gdregan?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: Mpmalu karac ka ali gdregan.
Mpmalo karac ka ali gdregan.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: Mpquyux ka ali ciida?
Mpqoyox ka ali ciida?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Mpthido ka ali ciida, uxe mquyux.
Mpthido ka ali ciida, oxe mqoyox.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: Mpquyux ka ali ciida?
Mpqoyox ka ali ciida?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Un! Mpquyux ka ali ciida.
Un! Mpqoyox ka ali ciida.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: Ga qmuyux?
Ga qmoyox?
Msuwan di! Ma ni thido di.
Msowan di! Ma ni thido di.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: Ga qmuyux?
Ga qmoyox?
Qmuyux di, ni ku ini adis trasi.
Qmoyox di, ni ko ini adis trasi.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: Ga qmuyux ka nganguc?
Ga qmoyox ka ngangoc?
Ini quyux ka saya. Bobo mnekan ka mquyux. Desi trasi musa su nganguc.
Ini qoyox ka saya. Bobo mnekan ka mqoyox. Desi trasi mosa so ngangoc.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: Mpsekuy ka misan kawas?
Mpsekoy ka misan kawas?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: Un, mpsekuy ka kawas, maha eguw hari ka lukus plkusun.
Un, mpsekoy ka kawas, maha egow hari ka lokos plkoson.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: Maha mttilux bale ka rbagan knii?
Maha mttilox bale ka rbagan knii?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: Un, mttilux ba ka rbagan, maha eguw hari ka mahun qsiya.
Un, mttilox ba ka rbagan, maha egow hari ka mahon qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Snkuxul su mprbagan ka isu?
Snkoxol so mprbagan ka iso?
Snkuxul ku mprbagan ka yaku, muuxul ka karac.
Snkoxol ko mprbagan ka yako, mooxol ka karac.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: Snkuxul su mpmisan ka isu?
Snkoxol so mpmisan ka iso?
Ini ku skuxul mpmisan ka yaku. Sbhuran ba bgihur paru peni.
Ini ko skoxol mpmisan ka yako. Sbhoran ba bgihor paro peni.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: Ni ku cmhungi madis patis.
Ni ko cmhongi madis patis.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: Spuwe ku isu qmita.
Spowe ko iso qmita.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: Ni ku cmhungi madis sserus.
Ni ko cmhongi madis sseros.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: Kbrexi naku.
Kbrexi nako.
Ga su cmhungi madis ppatis?
Ga so cmhongi madis ppatis?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: Un, kbrexi ku tikuh nisu ha?
Un, kbrexi ko tikoh niso ha?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: Meekan su ido maanu ka ceka naali?
Meekan so ido maano ka ceka naali?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: Meekan ku menpaw.
Meekan ko menpaw.
Meekan su maanu ka ido bbiyan?
Meekan so maano ka ido bbiyan?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: Meekan ku ido.
Meekan ko ido.
Mnekan su maanu ka ido mgrebu?
Mnekan so maano ka ido mgrebo?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: Mnekan ku balung.
Mnekan ko balong.
Mnekan su maanu ka ceka naali?
Mnekan so maano ka ceka naali?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnekan ku hei rodux.
Mnekan ko hei rodox.
Hae ta mtheyaq metur cubu.
Hae ta mtheyaq metor cobo.
Sai knama, yahun sumu skadi kiya hari di.
Sai knama, yahon somo skadi kiya hari di.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: Maha miyan lmanguy ka yami.
Maha miyan lmangoy ka yami.
Malu ma! Suupu ta musa!
Malo ma! Soopo ta mosa!
Hae ta mtheyaq cubu ita.
Hae ta mtheyaq cobo ita.
Uxe wa! Maha miyan hmaqul patis hayan.
Uxe wa! Maha miyan hmaqol patis hayan.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: Gnsegus su rupun di?
Gnsegos so ropon di?
Ini na, ni ku smino pngerah.
Ini na, ni ko smino pngerah.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: Snnawan su ka quwaq di?
Snnawan so ka qowaq di?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: Un, snnawan mu ka quwaq mu di.
Un, snnawan mo ka qowaq mo di.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: Snnawan su ka pngerah di?
Snnawan so ka pngerah di?
Un, snnawan mu ka pngerah di.
Un, snnawan mo ka pngerah di.
Ma su ini trmai ka baga su?
Ma so ini trmai ka baga so?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: Mtrima ku kiya hari ka yaku di.
Mtrima ko kiya hari ka yako di.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: Hmnuwa su ka soni?
Hmnowa so ka soni?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: Mnusa ku skadi mptgesa.
Mnosa ko skadi mptgesa.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: Mhuwa su da malix pyasan?
Mhowa so da malix pyasan?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: Mmaha ku asi usa sapah.
Mmaha ko asi osa sapah.
Mhuwa da malix pyasan ka heya?
Mhowa da malix pyasan ka heya?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: Mmaha kmeeki ka heya.
Mmaha kmeeki ka heya.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Ape, ga su sapa hi?
Ape, ga so sapa hi?
Ga ku hini, nleeluw remux truma.
Ga ko hini, nleelow remox troma.
Ape, ga su sapah hi?
Ape, ga so sapah hi?
Uka hini wa! Iwan ku ka yaku. Hmuwa? Rngae mu Ape da meyah.
Uka hini wa! Iwan ko ka yako. Hmowa? Rngae mo Ape da meyah.
S.TRANSL: Ape不在家耶!我是Iwan，有什麼事嗎? 回來我會轉告Ape。
Ape is not at home. I am Iwan. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: Ima namu ka yamu?
Ima namo ka yamo?
Bubu rudan, yami. Aking, ma Ape. Rwhani nami tikuh!
Bobo rodan, yami. Aking, ma Ape. Rwhani nami tikoh!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶，我們是Aking和Ape，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Aking and Ape, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: Ima ha?
Ima ha?
Yaku wa! Batu, ni ku meyah skadi Utun.
Yako wa! Bato, ni ko meyah skadi Uton.
S.TRANSL: I am Batu, I am here for Utun.

S.FORM: Bubu rudan, ni ku meyah qmita isu wa.
Bobo rodan, ni ko meyah qmita iso wa.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq su ba ini eyah di, lnlungun sumu bale.
Bsiyaq so ba ini eyah di, lnlongon somo bale.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了，我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Ape, ni ku meyah theyaq isu wa!
Ape, ni ko meyah theyaq iso wa!
S.TRANSL: Ape, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: Remux truma, bsiyaq sumu traan da.
Remox troma, bsiyaq somo traan da.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: Pnhmaan mu ka bunga nii, puqi!
Pnhmaan mo ka bonga nii, poqi!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: Mssibus ba puuqn ka bunga nii.
Mssibos ba pooqn ka bonga nii.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: Aguh hini! Pnhmaan mu ka hei qhuni nii, puqi!
Agoh hini! Pnhmaan mo ka hei qhoni nii, poqi!
S.TRANSL: 過來！這是我種的水果，請吃看看！
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: Mssibus bale puqun wa!
Mssibos bale poqon wa!
Tloung! Pnhmaan mu naq ka srqemu nii. puqi!
Tloong! Pnhmaan mo naq ka srqemo nii. poqi!
S.TRANSL: 請坐! 這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: Oo! Mssibus ba ka srqemu nii.
Oo! Mssibos ba ka srqemo nii.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: Meekan su mudu?
Meekan so modo?
Ini ku ekan mudu, baka puqun mu da ringgo.
Ini ko ekan modo, baka poqon mo da ringgo.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: Mekan su hlama pingkan?
Mekan so hlama pingkan?
Malu ma! Snkuxul ku mekan.
Malo ma! Snkoxol ko mekan.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: Kltane sumu ringgo puqun su.
Kltane somo ringgo poqon so.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: Mhuwe su wa! Eguw ba beyuq na ka hei qhuni nii.
Mhowe so wa! Egow ba beyoq na ka hei qhoni nii.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: Ngale ku qsiya mahun su.
Ngale ko qsiya mahon so.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: Mhuwe su bale.
Mhowe so bale.
Puqi! Eguw hnpure mu damac.
Poqi! Egow hnpore mo damac.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: Uu! Kncheya bale puqun.
Uo! Kncheya bale poqon.
S.TRANSL: 嗚! 真的很香也好吃。
Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: Puqi! Nii kana nana!
Poqi! Nii kana nana!
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: Uxe ku pqsiqa mekan da!
Uxe ko pqsiqa mekan da!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: Puqi, Nii kana nana!
Poqi, Nii kana nana!
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: Eguw bale pnuqan mu da! Mtengi ku bale di!
Egow bale pnoqan mo da! Mtengi ko bale di!
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，我真的吃飽了！
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: Desun maku lmiqu ka ali saya.
Deson mako lmiqo ka ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 我今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Eguw preko lmiqu mesa ka bubu.
Egow preko lmiqo mesa ka bobo.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: Desun maku yqeyaq ka ali saya.
Deson mako yqeyaq ka ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 我今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: Maha ta tmabul?
Maha ta tmabol?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: Maha ta inu ka ali saya?
Maha ta ino ka ali saya?
Desun maku siyo yayung.
Deson mako siyo yayong.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: Maha ta inu ka ali saya?
Maha ta ino ka ali saya?
Desun tana lmiqu mptgesa.
Deson tana lmiqo mptgesa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Maha ta siyo yayung ka ali saya?
Maha ta siyo yayong ka ali saya?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: Uxe, desun tana lmiqu mptgesa.
Uxe, deson tana lmiqo mptgesa.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: Maha ta lmiqu ka ali saya?
Maha ta lmiqo ka ali saya?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: Uxe, maha ta yqeyaq ka ali saya.
Uxe, maha ta yqeyaq ka ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: Mptgesa, maha ta qmita maanu ka siyo yayung?
Mptgesa, maha ta qmita maano ka siyo yayong?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: Maha ta qmita pdaus.
Maha ta qmita pdaos.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Mptgesa, maha ta qmita maanu ka lmiqu?
Mptgesa, maha ta qmita maano ka lmiqo?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: Maha ta qmita plale.
Maha ta qmita plale.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: Maha ta hmuwa ka yqeyaq?
Maha ta hmowa ka yqeyaq?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: Maha ta qmita pnhuma ta srqemu. Tai hari niqal qtahi, ma walu wa!
Maha ta qmita pnhoma ta srqemo. Tai hari niqal qtahi, ma walo wa!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: Mptgesa, maha ta lmanguy yayung?
Mptgesa, maha ta lmangoy yayong?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: Uxe, maha ta qmita pdaus.
Uxe, maha ta qmita pdaos.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Maha ta mhuma sama yqeyaq?
Maha ta mhoma sama yqeyaq?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: Uxe, maha ta tmabul.
Uxe, maha ta tmabol.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去翻土。
We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Pdaus ga ini gdema skiya waga.
Pdaos ga ini gdema skiya waga.
Saya ba bale ka ni ku qmita pdaus muudus.
Saya ba bale ka ni ko qmita pdaos moodos.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Plale ga ini gdema skiya waga.
Plale ga ini gdema skiya waga.
Uwa! Snkuxul ku plale! Malu ba qtaan.
Uwa! Snkoxol ko plale! Malo ba qtaan.
S.TRANSL: 哇! 我喜歡蝴蝶，很漂亮。
Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: Plale ka ga skiya waga.
Plale ka ga skiya waga.
Uxe plale ka kiya, walu ka kiya.
Uxe plale ka kiya, walo ka kiya.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Eniq hini qmita, iya osa theya wa!
Eniq hini qmita, iya osa theya wa!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: Un! Uxe miya maha theya.
Un! Uxe miya maha theya.
S.TRANSL: 好！我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: Iya ttalang, tghuwe mkkesa, tkure namu.
Iya ttalang, tghowe mkkesa, tkore namo.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得你們跌倒。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: Ni ku mtaaguh mqqmita ka yaku.
Ni ko mtaagoh mqqmita ka yako.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: Hmuwa su mesa musa behing?
Hmowa so mesa mosa behing?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: Mgeriq ku rulu musa behing.
Mgeriq ko rolo mosa behing.
Hmuwa mesa musa sapah ising ka heya?
Hmowa mesa mosa sapah ising ka heya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: Mkkesa musa sapah ising ka heya.
Mkkesa mosa sapah ising ka heya.
Huwa su mesa musa Ponghu ka isu?
Howa so mesa mosa Pongho ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Taapa ku sapah skiya musa Ponghu ka yaku.
Taapa ko sapah skiya mosa Pongho ka yako.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: Hmuwa su mesa musa Ponghu ka isu?
Hmowa so mesa mosa Pongho ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Taapa ku asu musa Ponghu ka yaku.
Taapa ko aso mosa Pongho ka yako.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Taapa su maanu musa sapah ka isu?
Taapa so maano mosa sapah ka iso?
Taapa ku ceyun musa sapah ka yaku.
Taapa ko ceyon mosa sapah ka yako.
Taapa maanu musa sapah pyasan ka Padiq?
Taapa maano mosa sapah pyasan ka Padiq?
S.TRANSL: How does Padiq go to school?

S.FORM: Taapa rulu puniq musa sapah pyasan ka Padiq.
Taapa rolo poniq mosa sapah pyasan ka Padiq.
S.TRANSL: Padiq goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Taapa maanu musa sapah thmkuwan ka Temu?
Taapa maano mosa sapah thmkowan ka Temo?
S.TRANSL: How does Basaw go to church?

S.FORM: Taapa rulu tmediq musa sapah thmkuwan ka Temu.
Taapa rolo tmediq mosa sapah thmkowan ka Temo.
S.TRANSL: Temu goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Taapa su ceyun musa sapah pyasan ka isu?
Taapa so ceyon mosa sapah pyasan ka iso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Uxe, taapa ku basu musa sapah pyasan ka yaku.
Uxe, taapa ko baso mosa sapah pyasan ka yako.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Taapa su rulu tmediq musa sapah pyasan ka isu?
Taapa so rolo tmediq mosa sapah pyasan ka iso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Un, taapa ku rulu tmediq musa sapah pyasan ka yaku.
Un, taapa ko rolo tmediq mosa sapah pyasan ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: Taapa su kawte musa Kawsiyong ka isu?
Taapa so kawte mosa Kawsiyong ka iso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Un, taapa ku Kawte musa Kawsiyong ka yaku.
Un, taapa ko Kawte mosa Kawsiyong ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: Musa su Taytong ye su taapa rulu puniq? Ye su taapa sapah skiya?
Mosa so Taytong ye so taapa rolo poniq? Ye so taapa sapah skiya?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Taapa ku sapah skiya. Ini beyo dhekan ka tpaan sapah skiya daka tpaan rulu puniq.
Taapa ko sapah skiya. Ini beyo dhekan ka tpaan sapah skiya daka tpaan rolo poniq.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: Musa su sapah thmkuwan, ye su taapa basu? Ye su mgeriq naq rulu?
Mosa so sapah thmkowan, ye so taapa baso? Ye so mgeriq naq rolo?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Mgeriq ku rulu musa sapah thmkuwan. Ini beyo ka mgeriq naq rulu daka taapa basu.
Mgeriq ko rolo mosa sapah thmkowan. Ini beyo ka mgeriq naq rolo daka taapa baso.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，自己開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: Ye msdaling sapah su daha ka sebunrebun?
Ye msdaling sapah so daha ka sebonrebon?
S.TRANSL: Is the market close to your house?

S.FORM: Mstheya! Asi ku ka taapa otobay musa.
Mstheya! Asi ko ka taapa otobay mosa.
S.TRANSL: 有距離，我必須騎摩托車去。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: Ye msdaling pdesan patis daha ka sapah pyasan?
Ye msdaling pdesan patis daha ka sapah pyasan?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Msdaling, dhekan ka mkkesa.
Msdaling, dhekan ka mkkesa.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Ye msdaling sapah ppuqan daha ka tpaan rulu?
Ye msdaling sapah ppoqan daha ka tpaan rolo?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Kndalax tpaan rulu, mkkesa rima taktak de dhekan da.
Kndalax tpaan rolo, mkkesa rima taktak de dhekan da.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Niqal su ali ka saya?
Niqal so ali ka saya?
Hmuwa wa?
Hmowa wa?
Ni ku mkmeyah qmita isu.
Ni ko mkmeyah qmita iso.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Muwa ka bobo na di? Uxe ku meeniq sapah ka ali saya.
Mowa ka bobo na di? Uxe ko meeniq sapah ka ali saya.
S.TRANSL: 下回好嗎？我今天有事不在家。
How about next time? I am away from home today for something.

S.FORM: Muwa ka kusun? Meeyah ku skadi isu bobo mnekan.
Mowa ka koson? Meeyah ko skadi iso bobo mnekan.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天好嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Malu ma! Traun suma sapah hini.
Malo ma! Traon soma sapah hini.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Ye ini huwa spooda mu sreeru kari? Mkptasun mu wa.
Ye ini howa spooda mo sreero kari? Mkptason mo wa.
S.TRANSL: 請問我們可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Malu ma! Ini huwa.
Malo ma! Ini howa.
Hmuwa ka psaun ta saso pnssingan ega?
Hmowa ka psaon ta saso pnssingan ega?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Iya wa! Naqah ku qtaan, ini snteri ka soko mu duri.
Iya wa! Naqah ko qtaan, ini snteri ka soko mo dori.
S.TRANSL: 不要啦!我不好看，倉庫也沒整理。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: Pssinge ta nanaq denu kini ho.
Pssinge ta nanaq deno kini ho.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Uxe ku psasing duri.
Uxe ko psasing dori.
Mhuwe su bale smruwa yaku meyah qmita isu.
Mhowe so bale smrowa yako meyah qmita iso.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Ini huwa! Maanu ka ssiling su?
Ini howa! Maano ka ssiling so?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Maanu ka qnpahan su sweewa hayan?
Maano ka qnpahan so sweewa hayan?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Mnksacu ku ka cbeyo, malix ku saya da!
Mnksaco ko ka cbeyo, malix ko saya da!
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了！
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: Ma niqal su qpahun ka saya di?
Ma niqal so qpahon ka saya di?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Ga ku qmeepah sapah pyasan.
Ga ko qmeepah sapah pyasan.
Ga meniq alang ka laqi su duri?
Ga meniq alang ka laqi so dori?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Ini, ga meniq alang paru ka laqi mu.
Ini, ga meniq alang paro ka laqi mo.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: Marux su naq meniq hini?
Marox so naq meniq hini?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Ga ku tmabu kingal huling ma kingal qbheni, tnsapah mu ka dheya duri.
Ga ko tmabo kingal holing ma kingal qbheni, tnsapah mo ka dheya dori.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Tmabu ku kingal ngiyo ka yaku, malu niqal tnbugan, tthiqun tikuh skdesun peni.
Tmabo ko kingal ngiyo ka yako, malo niqal tnbogan, tthiqon tikoh skdeson peni.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，為飼養物生活忙碌些。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Ni ku msiling isu pgyaun musa phuling wa!
Ni ko msiling iso pgyaon mosa pholing wa!
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌！
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Ini keegu ka klaun mu duri. Ani si, sprengo mu da knklaan mu.
Ini keego ka klaon mo dori. Ani si, sprengo mo da knklaan mo.
S.TRANSL: 我知道得也不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Niqal maanu ka pgyaun Qyqeya Phuling?
Niqal maano ka pgyaon Qyqeya Pholing?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Ini ptlengi mmqedil ka Qyqeya Phuling.
Ini ptlengi mmqedil ka Qyqeya Pholing.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: Ma, ye ini huwa musa phuling ka mmqedil duri ha?
Ma, ye ini howa mosa pholing ka mmqedil dori ha?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Ini! Ini srwai phuling ka mmqedil duri.
Ini! Ini srwai pholing ka mmqedil dori.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Awi, uka sino da! Sai tikuh maruy!
Awi, oka sino da! Sai tikoh maroy!
S.TRANSL: Awi, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Ga prayan hi ka kingal rusuq nana, anaq ini baruy hayan!
Ga prayan hi ka kingal rosoq nana, anaq ini baroy hayan!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Ini baka kingal rusuq, usa maruy daha rusuq dungal.
Ini baka kingal rosoq, osa maroy daha rosoq dongal.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Mbaruy ku sino. Ya namu ga gnbaruy sino?
Mbaroy ko sino. Ya namo ga gnbaroy sino?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Niqal wa! Maruy su knhenu?
Niqal wa! Maroy so knheno?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Daha rusuq, ma kingal lubuy beras.
Daha rosoq, ma kingal loboy beras.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Nii ka beras, maanu ngalun su dungal?
Nii ka beras, maano ngalon so dongal?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Niqal ka balung?
Niqal ka balong?
Uka ka balung da!
Uka ka balong da!
Maruy ku lukus.
Maroy ko lokos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: So kenu ka kuxul su?
So keno ka koxol so?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Lukus puto usuk.
Lokos poto osok.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Muwa ka mtanah nii?
Mowa ka mtanah nii?
Niqal rako maanu nana?
Niqal rako maano nana?
Niqal mbhege, ma mblawa.
Niqal mbhege, ma mblawa.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Biqi ku kingal mbhege.
Biqi ko kingal mbhege.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Awi, mnusa su inu ka soni? Mnusa su pstarin?
Awi, mnosa so ino ka soni? Mnosa so pstarin?
S.TRANSL: Awi，你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Awi, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Uxe, snkgulan ku pai musa maruy sama.
Uxe, snkgolan ko pai mosa maroy sama.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Ye kiya! Niqal ali su keeman? Spuwe ta mekan ido.
Ye kiya! Niqal ali so keeman? Spowe ta mekan ido.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Bobo na da ho? Maha ku maruy lukus.
Bobo na da ho? Maha ko maroy lokos.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Spuwe ta musa denu!
Spowe ta mosa deno!
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Sndamac su bale! Piya pila ka sama nii?
Sndamac so bale! Piya pila ka sama nii?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: Mpusan ka kingal bnkeyan sama.
Mposan ka kingal bnkeyan sama.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka bunga nii?
Piya pila ka bonga nii?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Mterun ka kingal toting bunga.
Mteron ka kingal toting bonga.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Biqi ku daha bnkeyan sama, ma kingal toting bunga.
Biqi ko daha bnkeyan sama, ma kingal toting bonga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Awi, ni ku cmhungi madis ppatis, kbrexi ku tikuh nisu han ho?
Awi, ni ko cmhongi madis ppatis, kbrexi ko tikoh niso han ho?
S.TRANSL: Awi，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Sudu, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Uka ku yaku duri, na Padiq ka ni mu dooyun duri wa!
Uka ko yako dori, na Padiq ka ni mo dooyon dori wa!
S.TRANSL: 我也沒有，我拿的這支也是Padiq的喔!

S.FORM: Muwa kbrexun saku tikuh? Maha sumu asi prihi naq saya.
Mowa kbrexon sako tikoh? Maha somo asi prihi naq saya.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Un, ngali.
Un, ngali.
Mhuwe su bale, mhuwe su bale kesa ka Padiq duri.
Mhowe so bale, mhowe so bale kesa ka Padiq dori.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Padiq for me.

S.FORM: Maanu nana wa?
Maano nana wa?
Daha patis nii.
Daha patis nii.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Un, maanu nana?
Un, maano nana?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: Pkbarux ku teru patis nii duri.
Pkbarox ko tero patis nii dori.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Un, hadi hini da bobo mkteru ali.
Un, hadi hini da bobo mktero ali.
S.TRANSL: 好了，記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Ini saku hadi hini ka serus nana.
Ini sako hadi hini ka seros nana.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Wada sumu hadun ciga da hayan.
Wada somo hadon ciga da hayan.
Ma wada uka ka serus mu duri di?
Ma wada oka ka seros mo dori di?
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了？
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Uxe su wada skbarux Awi di peni!
Uxe so wada skbarox Awi di peni!
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Awi?

S.FORM: Ini mu klai wa. Hae mu smiling hayan.
Ini mo klai wa. Hae mo smiling hayan.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Ngali naku nii hayan peni.
Ngali nako nii hayan peni.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Padiq, knbrexan suna Awi ka lukus pbabo nii?
Padiq, knbrexan sona Awi ka lokos pbabo nii?
S.TRANSL: Padiq, did Awi lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Uxe, bnaruy kuna bubu mu ka nii.
Uxe, bnaroy kona bobo mo ka nii.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Mntena bale ka lukus pbabo namu yamu ka Awi.
Mntena bale ka lokos pbabo namo yamo ka Awi.
S.TRANSL: Awi’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Qalux lukus pbabo na ka heya. Ini pntena ka rako nami.
Qalox lokos pbabo na ka heya. Ini pntena ka rako nami.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Padiq, ye su knbarux pila na Awi ka isu ha?
Padiq, ye so knbarox pila na Awi ka iso ha?
S.TRANSL: ,Padiq did you borrow money from Awi?

S.FORM: Kiya ma, naka mu bale prihun saya, ni ku cmhungi madis pila da.
Kiya ma, naka mo bale prihon saya, ni ko cmhongi madis pila da.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: So kiya de, prrihun su knuwan denu?
So kiya de, prrihon so knowan deno?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Kusun.
Koson.
Oo, sae sumu mrengo Awi denu.
Oo, sae somo mrengo Awi deno.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Awi for you.

S.FORM: Sqapi btunux ka qolic, ma sdurang snuyuk ka tkurih.
Sqapi btonox ka qolic, ma sdorang snoyok ka tkorih.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Kela naq so kiya, ni ku qnuuqu da! Kiya uka ba ka nngalan mu.
Kela naq so kiya, ni ko qnooqo da! Kiya oka ba ka nngalan mo.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Tgsae sumu smmalu daha spoosa tmlenga nii dungal.
Tgsae somo smmalo daha spoosa tmlenga nii dongal.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: Bale, malu wa! Maha ku maangal bobo na denu!
Bale, malo wa! Maha ko maangal bobo na deno!
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了！
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Eguw ba sudu hmneru yqeyaq ni da! Sai mangal kagul ga sapah, maha ta tmatak sudu yqeyaq.
Egow ba sodo hmnero yqeyaq ni da! Sai mangal kagol ga sapah, maha ta tmatak sodo yqeyaq.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去家裡拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Ga inu ka kagul?
Ga ino ka kagol?
Gaga siyo btuku, remux su sapah, maha su asi qtai.
Gaga siyo btoko, remox so sapah, maha so asi qtai.
S.TRANSL: 在圓篩的旁邊，你進去家裡就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Tai hari mangal su, ngale su luqah, mhungun bale ka kagul.
Tai hari mangal so, ngale so loqah, mhongon bale ka kagol.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Qlqahe su ka durang mu!
Qlqahe so ka dorang mo!
Ga inu ka durang su?
Ga ino ka dorang so?
Ga toma qhuni waga ka durang mu.
Ga toma qhoni waga ka dorang mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Masu klaun?
Maso klaon?
Niqal pnskraya mu hini, klaun mu naq ga inu ka durang mu.
Niqal pnskraya mo hini, klaon mo naq ga ino ka dorang mo.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Nii ge, kobu qcurux, psaun miyan ruru saangal qcurux.
Nii ge, kobo qcorox, psaon miyan roro saangal qcorox.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Uka miyan kobu qcurux ka yami, pllingun miyan ka mangal qcurux.
Uka miyan kobo qcorox ka yami, pllingon miyan ka mangal qcorox.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Ini ku plaling mnnexan ka yaku, muwa tgsaun saku ka bobo na?
Ini ko plaling mnnexan ka yako, mowa tgsaon sako ka bobo na?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Malu wa! Spuwe ta musa plaling ka bobo na denu.
Malo wa! Spowe ta mosa plaling ka bobo na deno.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Ma tgsae sumu smmalu kobo qcurux bobo da duri.
Ma tgsae somo smmalo kobo qcorox bobo da dori.
S.TRANSL: 那我下次也教你做魚筌。
I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Mlgelu pnlingan su da! Ye uxe ga tdiyan qcurux di? Nleelu blebil!
Mlgelo pnlingan so da! Ye oxe ga tdiyan qcorox di? Nleelo blebil!
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來！
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Trai tikuh hayan, mlgelu riyung ka asu. Blbilo mu hini, sai mangal tikuh ka kadi waga.
Trai tikoh hayan, mlgelo riyong ka aso. Blbilo mo hini, sai mangal tikoh ka kadi waga.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Blbili quri hini ka qcurux, dyage sumu blebil.
Blbili qori hini ka qcorox, dyage somo blebil.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Keyan bale knmalu! Stenge rawa Nnngalanl ta qcurux di.
Keyan bale knmalo! Stenge rawa Nnngalanl ta qcorox di.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Hae ta nleeluw musa msaasu sapah hiya.
Hae ta nleelow mosa msaaso sapah hiya.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Gisu mptgesa di.
Giso mptgesa di.
iya theyaq di, Nhari tlong tloongan.
iya theyaq di, Nhari tlong tloongan.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Wah, nii ku smrahuq di!
Wah, nii ko smrahoq di!
Eyah truma.
Eyah troma.
Gndregan maanu, ka ali saya?
Gndregan maano, ka ali saya?
Ali gndregan rima ka saya, mduru ka kusun, nita suupu theyaq!
Ali gndregan rima ka saya, mdoro ka koson, nita soopo theyaq!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: Un! wa. Nita siyo yayung.
Un! wa. Nita siyo yayong.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: Ali gndregan maanu ka kusun?
Ali gndregan maano ka koson?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Ali gndregan teru kusun, kusun bobo mnekan nita theyaq cubu!
Ali gndregan tero koson, koson bobo mnekan nita theyaq cobo!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Mphuwa su mgrebu kusun?
Mphowa so mgrebo koson?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Ali gndregan ka kusun, yami bubu mu maha miyan sapah thmukuwan.
Ali gndregan ka koson, yami bobo mo maha miyan sapah thmokowan.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Ga su hmuwa di?
Ga so hmowa di?
nii ku mpbheriq, maha ku benjyo.
nii ko mpbheriq, maha ko benjyo.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Nii tgiya tunux mu.
Nii tgiya tonox mo.
Uras sange ka isu.
Uras sange ka iso.
Mptgesa, nii ku mnarux nbuyas, maha ku benjyo.
Mptgesa, nii ko mnarox nboyas, maha ko benjyo.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Un, osa nhari.
Un, osa nhari.
malu mosa ku trima baga?
malo mosa ko trima baga?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Uxe beyo msange di, usa kiya hari.
Uxe beyo msange di, osa kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: mptgesa, niku mnarux tunux, mdru ku bobo mnekan.
mptgesa, niko mnarox tonox, mdro ko bobo mnekan.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: un, Tai hari mosa sapah.
on, Tai hari mosa sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Mptgesa, mdru ku meyah ali gndregan kingal, maha ku pqita ising.
Mptgesa, mdro ko meyah ali gndregan kingal, maha ko pqita ising.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Un, qlahang hari hei su.
Un, qlahang hari hei so.
Gaga inu ka Iwan?
Gaga ino ka Iwan?
Gaga mnarux nbuyas, ga meniq benjyo.
Gaga mnarox nboyas, ga meniq benjyo.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Awi?
Gaga ino ka Awi?
mptgesa, mnarux gelu ka Awi, mdru ka ali saya.
mptgesa, mnarox gelo ka Awi, mdro ka ali saya.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Awi has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: malux ini eyah ka Iwan?
malox ini eyah ka Iwan?
Ga mttilux hei.
Ga mttilox hei.
Pgkela ku yaku.
Pgkela ko yako.
Tado ku Walis, maxal ka knkawas mu saya.
Tado ko Walis, maxal ka knkawas mo saya.
S.TRANSL: My name is Walis, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Ima ka ngayan su?
Ima ka ngayan so?
Awi Pering ngayan mu.
Awi Pering ngayan mo.
Laqi su seediq inu?
Laqi so seediq ino?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: laqi ku Seediq ka yaku.
laqi ko Seediq ka yako.
Ye Seediq kana ka tnsapah su?
Ye Seediq kana ka tnsapah so?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Seediq, kana tnsapah mu.
Seediq, kana tnsapah mo.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是賽德克族人。
Yes, my whole family is Seediq.

S.FORM: Ye Seediq kana tnsapah su?
Ye Seediq kana tnsapah so?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: uxe, Seediq ka tama mu mukan ka bubu mu.
oxe, Seediq ka tama mo mokan ka bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是賽德克族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Seediq, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Laqi su naq ima?
Laqi so naq ima?
Laqi ku na Awi Temu ka yaku.
Laqi ko na Awi Temo ka yako.
Ima ka tamas su? Piya ka knkawas na heya di?
Ima ka tamas so? Piya ka knkawas na heya di?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: mterun kmxalan knkawas na heya.
mteron kmxalan knkawas na heya.
kenu ka tama su? Piya ka knkawas na di?
keno ka tama so? Piya ka knkawas na di?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Uxe, rudan alang miyan ka heya, mmsepac kmxalan ka knkawas na.
Uxe, rodan alang miyan ka heya, mmsepac kmxalan ka knkawas na.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: piya knkawas na ka qbsurun su rseno?
piya knkawas na ka qbsoron so rseno?
Maxal mmsepac knkawas na ka qbsuran mu rseno.
Maxal mmsepac knkawas na ka qbsoran mo rseno.
ye hmrinsa egu knkawas na qbsuran rseno su daka isu?
ye hmrinsa ego knkawas na qbsoran rseno so daka iso?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Hmrinas miyan rima knkawas.
Hmrinas miyan rima knkawas.
Piya knbbaro hnyegan su?
Piya knbbaro hnyegan so?
Kingal kbekuy msptaun snkukuh qndisan knbbaro mu ka yaku.
Kingal kbekoy msptaon snkokoh qndisan knbbaro mo ka yako.
Bsiyaq ta ini pqita, nii su so hari mdakil di?
Bsiyaq ta ini pqita, nii so so hari mdakil di?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: kiya ma kingal mterun snkukuh qndisan knbbaro mu ka yaku.
kiya ma kingal mteron snkokoh qndisan knbbaro mo ka yako.
Uxe su ga qtehur?
Uxe so ga qtehor?
Iya, tgqui qmita.
Iya, tgqoi qmita.
Uxe su kure di?
Uxe so kore di?
ini, qtehur ku di.
ini, qtehor ko di.
Ye su ga qtehur di?
Ye so ga qtehor di?
un, Mterun knchedil mu saya.
on, Mteron knchedil mo saya.
Maha su inu?
Maha so ino?
Maha ku sapah ptasan skadi mptgesa.
Maha ko sapah ptasan skadi mptgesa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Ukan, maha sui nu?
Ukan, maha soi no?
Maha qmada sudu nlaxn.
Maha qmada sodo nlaxn.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Pihu?
Gaga ino ka Piho?
Gaga han rmanguy, maha psseung rmanguy kiya hari.
Gaga han rmangoy, maha psseong rmangoy kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Gaga inu Ape? Maha psseung tmalang kiya hari.
Gaga ino Ape? Maha psseong tmalang kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: Ape在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Ape? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Gaga thmkuwan, hae mu mlawa.
Gaga thmkowan, hae mo mlawa.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: Suupu nita undozo.
Soopo nita ondozo.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Maha ku skadi isu kiya hari, hae ku mari puqun ceka naali han.
Maha ko skadi iso kiya hari, hae ko mari poqon ceka naali han.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: Nita suupu dmidil hndayu.
Nita soopo dmidil hndayo.
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Maha ku skadi mptgesa, usa skadi seediq.
Maha ko skadi mptgesa, osa skadi seediq.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Iyung maha su psseung cubu biciq ka saya?
Iyong maha so psseong cobo biciq ka saya?
S.TRANSL: Is Iyung competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Uxe, maha psseung milo.
Uxe, maha psseong milo.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Ye su maha psseung tmalang psseung pstarin ali ciida?
Ye so maha psseong tmalang psseong pstarin ali ciida?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Un, maha ku psseung tmalang.
Un, maha ko psseong tmalang.
Ye su maha psseung tmalang psseung pstarin ali ciida?
Ye so maha psseong tmalang psseong pstarin ali ciida?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Maha ku psseung cubu biciq.
Maha ko psseong cobo biciq.
Mphuwa ta ail Psseung pstarin ciida?
Mphowa ta ail Psseong pstarin ciida?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Maha miyan psseung blebin snuyuk.
Maha miyan psseong blebin snoyok.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: Ye ta gmbari ppuqun ka psseung pstarin ?
Ye ta gmbari ppoqon ka psseong pstarin ?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Uxe, gmbari ta cubu.
Uxe, gmbari ta cobo.
Kedu beyax mangal su tgberah.
Kedo beyax mangal so tgberah.
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: Mhuwe.
Mhowe.
Ye gaga sapah ka bubu rudan?
Ye gaga sapah ka bobo rodan?
Gaga hii, gaga taqi tqiyan.
Gaga hii, gaga taqi tqiyan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Ye gaga sapah ka bubu rudan?
Ye gaga sapah ka bobo rodan?
Uka hii, wada ngerac, meyah keeman sapah di.
Uka hii, wada ngerac, meyah keeman sapah di.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Ye gaga sapah ka tama rudan?
Ye gaga sapah ka tama rodan?
Gaga dudulan baro, hai skadi.
Gaga dodolan baro, hai skadi.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Ye niqal seediq sapah?
Ye niqal seediq sapah?
Awi, bsiyaq sumu ini qtai di, malu su?
Awi, bsiyaq somo ini qtai di, malo so?
S.TRANSL: 是Awi阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Awi. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Malu ku wa! Meyah ku theyaq isu.
Malo ko wa! Meyah ko theyaq iso.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Gaga inu tama su?
Gaga ino tama so?
Gaga tnsiyus sama prayan, hae mu mlawa.
Gaga tnsiyos sama prayan, hae mo mlawa.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Wada inu Awe di?
Wada ino Awe di?
Wada kadu rodux qmerac rodux.
Wada kado rodox qmerac rodox.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Tama rudan, gisu nami di.
Tama rodan, giso nami di.
Uka sapah hii tama rudan, gaga yqeyaq, tara meyah sapah.
Uka sapah hii tama rodan, gaga yqeyaq, tara meyah sapah.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Baki gisu su di!
Baki giso so di!
Bsiyaq ini bqita, bbaro hnyegan su di.
Bsiyaq ini bqita, bbaro hnyegan so di.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: Mqaras ku qmita isu.
Mqaras ko qmita iso.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: Biqun yamu sputu nii, psai kulu huda.
Biqon yamo spoto nii, psai kolo hoda.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq namu ini eyah, ga mu plawa meyah mekan ido hini kana.
Bsiyaq namo ini eyah, ga mo plawa meyah mekan ido hini kana.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Iya mmiyaq di, ini huwa mimah ku ocya, theyaq ta ceka dheran.
Iya mmiyaq di, ini howa mimah ko ocya, theyaq ta ceka dheran.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Mhuwe su knmalu bale, maha ku di.
Mhowe so knmalo bale, maha ko di.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Hani snnipaq rodux nii, desi naq tghuwe mekan isu.
Hani snnipaq rodox nii, desi naq tghowe mekan iso.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Psterung ta kusun bobo mnekan ho?
Psterong ta koson bobo mnekan ho?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Malu ma, psterung ta so inu?
Malo ma, psterong ta so ino?
Muwa psterung ta sapah pyasan ? Psasing ta.
Mowa psterong ta sapah pyasan ? Psasing ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Nita ssliyan seediq hiya, mplukus ku lukus seediq musa.
Nita ssliyan seediq hiya, mplokos ko lokos seediq mosa.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Malu qtaan snegi alang nami, Mphepah de eyah skadi yaku.
Malo qtaan snegi alang nami, Mphepah de eyah skadi yako.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Ptara dehuk mprbagan tena tghuwe di.
Ptara dehok mprbagan tena tghowe di.
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: Eyah de smmesung ciida.
Eyah de smmesong ciida.
Malu ma. Psmeyah ku riyung.
Malo ma. Psmeyah ko riyong.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Malux su maha meniq alang di?
Malox so maha meniq alang di?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Maha ku tmgesa alang.
Maha ko tmgesa alang.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Malux su ini tgesa alang paru?
Malox so ini tgesa alang paro?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Ado ku lmngelun alang mu, niqal lnlungan mu dmayo alang.
Ado ko lmngelon alang mo, niqal lnlongan mo dmayo alang.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Mkela su riyung tminun, ima tngesa isu?
Mkela so riyong tminon, ima tngesa iso?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Heya mkela riyung tminun alang miyan, bubu mu rudan.
Heya mkela riyong tminon alang miyan, bobo mo rodan.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Malux su lmngelun mksluhe tminun?
Malox so lmngelon mkslohe tminon?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Mkpslutuc Gaya miyan, tminun ka Gaya nami.
Mkpslotoc Gaya miyan, tminon ka Gaya nami.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Malu mahun ka sino bale nii.
Malo mahon ka sino bale nii.
Yaku naq msino sino.
Yako naq msino sino.
Keyan su knkela, ye bisyaq ba msino sino?
Keyan so knkela, ye bisyaq ba msino sino?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Ini, maha hari mpitu ali. Prayun ka ido dhequy ma ido gmaxun tamun, psaun liwas denu.
Ini, maha hari mpito ali. Prayon ka ido dheqoy ma ido gmaxon tamon, psaon liwas deno.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: Niqal maanu ga su brigun?
Niqal maano ga so brigon?
Niqal ku ucik ma qucun, pnhmaan mu naq yaku kana!
Niqal ko ocik ma qocon, pnhmaan mo naq yako kana!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Piya pila brigun kana daha?
Piya pila brigon kana daha?
Daha kbekuy mriman pila kana.
Daha kbekoy mriman pila kana.
Kuxul mu lukus nii,, piya pila?
Koxol mo lokos nii,, piya pila?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Rima kbekuy pila ka nii.
Rima kbekoy pila ka nii.
Pila paru, naka seeliq hari?
Pila paro, naka seeliq hari?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Uxe, maha uka stnkeyan mu ka yaku.
Uxe, maha oka stnkeyan mo ka yako.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: Un! Kiya mangal ku kingal lukus qalux.
Un! Kiya mangal ko kingal lokos qalox.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Muku ku niqal yayu ma ribo nii.
Moko ko niqal yayo ma ribo nii.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Mpusan kbekuy pila kana, maha bsiyaq ddooyun, slmeyan mu baga mu naq yaku.
Mposan kbekoy pila kana, maha bsiyaq ddooyon, slmeyan mo baga mo naq yako.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Muwa mhenuk hari brigan, tngsaan ku na dangi mu meyah mari?
Mowa mhenok hari brigan, tngsaan ko na dangi mo meyah mari?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Malu wa,Un qhrigan sumu bbrigun.
Malo wa,Un qhrigan somo bbrigon.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Niqal gmbari bunuh lukus, eyah qmita!
Niqal gmbari bonoh lokos, eyah qmita!
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka lukus?
Piya pila ka lokos?
Kingal lukus teru kbekuy mriman pila, teru de maxal kbekuy pila.
Kingal lokos tero kbekoy mriman pila, tero de maxal kbekoy pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Mari ku kingal, biqi ku bgurah na.
Mari ko kingal, biqi ko bgorah na.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Malu su, mkmari ku ido dhequy ma siyang mao.
Malo so, mkmari ko ido dheqoy ma siyang mao.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Mhedu ku gmbari ido di, niqal hlama sangas, mari su?
Mhedo ko gmbari ido di, niqal hlama sangas, mari so?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Un, biqi ku kingal, bobo de meyah ku mari ido.
Un, biqi ko kingal, bobo de meyah ko mari ido.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Un, lubuwan mu lubuy mriman pila kana.
Un, lobowan mo loboy mriman pila kana.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
